description:
In this course you will be given an introduction on the Sneaker Reselling Marketplace where hundreds of entrepreneurs are capitalizing on this billion dollar industry. I will show you:

  • How people are investing $300 and seeing returns of $2000 in one day
  • Find the value of your product
  • What type of shoes to purchase to maximize profits
  • Sneaker Communities and Landscape
  • Where to sell your product
  • Sneaker Market Terms
  • How to be successful in this sector

Join me in understanding and adventuring into this booming field so that you can capitalize on the millions that are being made in the Sneaker Reselling Marketplace. If you have any questions regarding the course I am more than happy to answer them.
title: Sneaker Reselling: The Unknown Billion Dollar Industry
